topic.title: Is there any technical discussion forum or subforum served at Zeronet?
topic.body: I have doubts about some details of the realization of zeronet

topic.title: 旧论新解：“中国人是需要管的”
topic.body:
每新增一类自由，就相当于在OS里多加一个system call, 在编程语言里多写一个新的类或一个新的函数。随之而来的指数级增长的异常要处理吧，兼容性要考虑吧，热部署要考虑吧，bug要修吧... 但是有那么多素质超群的senoir developer、运维以及各种组织角色吗？不怕频繁的崩溃重启吗？你不怕下面的人不怕吗？有多少人一直在用最新版本的OS？

"Freedom is not free"

2_1GEfdZ7AyiBeEj8341JU5yZrCWCCczGDg5.body:
> [weakish](#comment_68_1GnJD7CXskmG8GywMbTvbP12wneCFW9XzR): Here (ZeroTalk) is the forum to discuss ZeroNet. For technical details on Zeronet, check the presentation hosted at google doc, the official documentation hosted at readthedocs.io, and the source code (If you think the source code size is too big, you can check the Go port, which has limited features but has much less lines of code.)

I don't think that's really a good idea if we take a look at the list of the threads. IMO this forum is in lack of manpower to category the contents.

2_17tQX9J2fScN9APmweSUnzEU4EfTG1ojYb.body: I like every internet service out of ZeroNet. I smell a lot of money here ...

2_17ac9ybVj5CtUpBvi5NeP1EwNZjfJoZWvt.body: Chat service over P2P network could be an alternative

1_1LogBQ7aRYS9KNPZx2nrNKserBBAL5XhyD.body: I've always been wondering about the future of the manufacturing industry. Is it really worth a full commitment of human resources in our time? On the one hand we need full employment to regale the voters, on the other we are entering a new world where A.I. could very soon replace humans in most of the jobs, if not all. How could workers compete with A.I., which never requires a pay rise or complain about overwork? I see no policy address this issue at all, though it could be a much much bigger problem.

1509649171_1Cy3ntkN2GN9MH6EaW6eHpi4YoRS2.body: Theoretically, it might NOT be the latest version when we pull a repo, because it takes time for the latest repo to sync across the whole ZeroNet network.  And soon somebody has to pay for extra storage space. Nevertheless a good idea for backup.

5_1EG11ySHg4mXe3GEVwF3nVPAaX3rcvhiDd.body: It's probably a little bit dangerous to concentrate all mankind on the Earth. Space should be our new home.

1509939880_1A3XsuLB6P7LQPCw1QWASG7RGSwrC.body: An interesting concept. Good luck with it.
